00030 //tool.cc - functions in classes tool, millTool, etc
00031 
00032 tool::tool() {
00033   valid = false;
00034   profile.Nullify();
00035   type = UNDEFINED;
00036 }
00037 
00038 millTool::millTool() {
00039   shape = UNDEF;
00040   type = ROTARY_TOOL;
00041   d=0.0;
00042   l=0.0;
00043   revol.Nullify();
00044 }
00045 
00046 const TopoDS_Solid& millTool::getRevol() {
00047   if (revol.IsNull()) {
00048     gp_Ax1 vertical(gp_Pnt(0,0,0),gp_Dir(0,0,1));
00049     BRepPrimAPI_MakeRevol rev(profile,vertical,M_PI,true);
00050     valid = rev.IsDone();
00051     if (valid)
00052       revol = TopoDS::Solid( rev.Shape() );
00053   }
00054   return revol;
00055 }

00057 
00065 //if this doesnt work, try raytracing
00066 // see also OpenCASCADE6.3.0/samples/standard/mfc/12_HLR/src/SelectionDialog.cpp
00067 //Prs3d_Projector (const Standard_Boolean Pers, const Quantity_Length Focus, const Quantity_Length DX, const Quantity_Length DY, const Quantity_Length DZ, const Quantity_Length XAt, const Quantity_Length YAt, const Quantity_Length ZAt, const Quantity_Length XUp, const Quantity_Length YUp, const Quantity_Length ZUp)
00068 const TopoDS_Face& millTool::getProj(degrees deg) {
00069   double zloc = 5; //zloc is z coordinate of projection
00070   Handle(HLRBRep_Algo)myAlgo = new HLRBRep_Algo();
00071   myAlgo->Add(profile);
00072   Prs3d_Projector myProj(false,0, 0,0,zloc, 0,0,1, 0,0,1); point
00073   myAlgo->Projector(myProj.Projector());
00074   myAlgo->Update();
00075   HLRBRep_HLRToShape aHLRToShape(myAlgo);
00076   TopoDS_Shape Proj = aHLRToShape.VCompound();
00077   return TopoDS::Face(Proj);
00078 }
00079 
00080 //aptTool::aptTool() {}
00081 
00082 ballnoseTool::ballnoseTool(double diameter, double length) {
00083   double r = diameter/2.0;
00084   valid = false;
00085   Handle(Geom_TrimmedCurve) Tc;
00086   Tc = GC_MakeArcOfCircle (gp_Pnt(r,0,r), gp_Pnt(0,0,0), gp_Pnt(-r,0,r));
00087   TopoDS_Edge& Ec = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(Tc);
00088   TopoDS_Edge& E1 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(r,0,r), gp_Pnt(r,0,length));
00089   TopoDS_Edge& E2 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(-r,0,r), gp_Pnt(-r,0,length));
00090   TopoDS_Edge& E3 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(-r,0,length), gp_Pnt(r,0,length));
00091   BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire wm(Ec,E1,E2,E3);
00092   if ( wm.IsDone() ) {
00093     TopoDS_Wire& w = wm.Wire();
00094     if ( w.Closed() ) {
00095       BRepBuilderAPI_MakeFace f(w);
00096       if (f.IsDone()) {
00097         profile = f.Face();
00098         valid = true;
00099         shape = BALLNOSE;
00100       }
00101     }
00102   }
00103 }

00105 latheTool::latheTool() {
00106  type = TURNING_TOOL;
00107 }
